definition: positive odd number (also written 奇數|奇数)/singular (grammar)
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Usted and ustedes are respectful and formal words used to express you , in the singular and plural forms.
sentences.chinese: 您和您們是正式和尊敬的稱呼，有單數和複數之分。

sentences.english: I. 1 Is the subject singular or plural?
Collective nouns are used with singular verbs.
sentences.chinese: 集合名詞與單數動詞連用。

sentences.english: Purchasing managers in manufacturing firms also report mounting orders.
sentences.chinese: 在製造業公司的採購經理們也報告了訂單數的回升。

sentences.english: The members of a collegial panel shall be odd in number.
sentences.chinese: 合議庭的成員人數應當是單數。

sentences.english: Plus, Tu is always singular. If you talk to more than one person, use vous.
sentences.chinese: Tu永遠是單數，如果你和多個人交談要用vous。
乳罩爲什麼是單數，而內褲是複數。

sentences.english: Subiect is the third person, according to the agreement, which form of'have'should you use here?
sentences.chinese: 主語是第三人稱單數，根據主謂一致原則，助動詞。

sentences.english: Singular count nouns always take a determiner.
sentences.chinese: 可數名詞單數前需用限定詞。

sentences.english: When giving bouquets, Romanians use flowers of odd number.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬尼亞人送花束時，棵數應是單數。

sentences.english: Singular subjects go with singular verbs .
sentences.chinese: 單數主語與單數動詞連用。

sentences.english: Singular subjects go with singular verbs .
sentences.chinese: 單數主語與單數動詞連用。

sentences.english: This possessive use was at first confined to the singular.
sentences.chinese: 後一種用法開始只限於單數名詞。

sentences.english: Use I when you record or memorize sentences or words.
sentences.chinese: 抄錄和記憶句型與慣用語時，要用單數第一人稱。

sentences.english: Models are always singular, and their corresponding tables are always plural.
sentences.chinese: 模型總是單數，而其對應的表總是複數。

definition: lit. two armies have equivalent banners and drums (idiom); fig. evenly matched/roughly comparable (opponents)
